About me

I'm Raveendra and I'm a

I am a very simple person who works hard for reaching to success and has a passion for learning new things. Currently, I am a third-year undergraduate at the University of Colombo School of Computing and do the B.Sc in Computer Science degree there. WP/MT Yattapatha K.V was my school up until my O/L and I did my A/L from Ananda Sastralaya, Matugama. I am very interested in web development and work on it by learning new technologies and brushing up my skills. My ambition also to starts my career in that field. Most of the time, I spend my free time listening to music and writing poems. It gives me a lot of relaxation and refreshments to my day-to-day life. As well, I do video editing as one of my hobbies too.
